data.why:
Relating to ClearCase, MultiSite, ClearQuest and ClearMake. Fill in
    some gaps that David Boyce left out.

    I also have a Tk module (oh, yet another!) for creating wizard
    dialogs with separate pages and handlers for each page, like on
    Windows.

    All of my work is SCM related.

meta.subject: PAUSE ID request (DBAIRD; David Louis Baird)
